Heading: No conditions
Note: Allows positive indication that there are no conditions (the default if <PriceCondition> is omitted)

Heading: Includes updates
Note: Purchase at this price includes specified updates

Heading: Must also purchase updates
Note: Purchase at this price requires commitment to purchase specified updates, not included in price

Heading: Updates available
Note: Updates may be purchased separately, no minimum commitment required

Heading: Linked subsequent purchase price
Note: Purchase at this price requires commitment to purchase specified other product, not included in price

Heading: Linked prior purchase price
Note: Purchase at this price requires prior purchase of other product

Heading: Linked price
Note: Purchase at this price requires simultaneous purchase of other product

Heading: Rental duration
Note: The duration of the rental to which the price applies. Deprecated, use <PriceConstraint> instead

Heading: Rental to purchase
Note: Purchase at this price requires prior rental of the product. <PriceConditionQuantity> gives minimum prior rental period, and <ProductIdentifier> may be used if rental uses a different product identifier

Heading: Rental extension
Note: Upgrade to longer rental duration. <PriceConditionQuantity> gives minimum prior rental duration, and <ProductIdentifier> may be used if rental uses a different product identifier. Separate price constraint with time limited licence duration (code 07) specifies the new combined rental duration
